'''Jade Fragment (Left)''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade}}. Bringing it, along with [[Jade Fragment (Right)]] to the Ancient Jade Pendant in [[Chizhang Wall]] for the {{Achievement|A Ruined Tale}}, along with the final mural for the {{Achievement|The Mural Veil}}.
